description.value: This U.S. industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in manufacturing vitreous china plumbing fixtures and china and earthenware bathroom accessories, such as faucet handles, towel bars, and soap dishes.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Grind or cut tiles, stones, concrete, bricks, or terrazzo Make products from silica powder/stone or other fibrogenic minerals Spray and resand chromate-containing paints Spray paints or glazes containing cadmium pigments
